nodes.text: Anakin: Apprentice is a Star Wars Legends young readers book written by Marc Cerasini and illustrated by Tommy Lee Edwards. The book is part of the Jedi Readers series, and it was published by LucasBooks on April 23, 2002. Set immediately before Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, Anakin: Apprentice follows Anakin Skywalker as he reflects on his past adventures.
Nineteen-year-old Anakin Skywalker, apprentice to Obi-Wan Kenobi, remembers some of his past adventures in which he raced swoop bikes, built androids, and found crystals to complete his lightsaber.
Anakin: Apprentice adapts events from other Star Wars books, including Jedi Quest: Path to Truth and Rogue Planet.
